item.title: Python Basic
item.description: Python Basic # Install macOS # Check the default version of Python on macOS # $ python --version Python 2.7.16 $ which python /usr/bin/python Install the latest version using Homebrew # brew update Update Homebrew itself brew install Install package $ brew update $ brew install python Add Python’s path # $ vi ~/.bash_profile export PATH="/usr/local/opt/python/libexec/bin:$PATH" $ source ~/.bash_profile Check that the latest version is available # $ python --version Python 3.
